overview: A homesick American soldier stationed in England during World War II makes an unauthorized  trip to see his wife and returns to England with only two people knowing he was home for a few hours. When she learns that she is pregnant, she does not disclose that her husband had paid her a visit as to not get him into trouble. The townspeople are unanimous in their condemnation of her. But, after his discharge, he enlists the aid of a nightclub singer, the only other person who knew he came home.
tagline: Keep Quiet!...Don't let this wise old stork bend your ear, brother! But once Annie's secret is out...you'll howl with delight!
title: Rendezvous with Annie
